div.div:
Roy - December 30, 2011 - SEMC Xperia Arc with version 1.07
Great App
Glad this app is now available for Android as I have been using it on Symbian for years. Works seamless with all my devices. Great app to have and cheap.

Rono - January 12, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.07
Problems
Have been using this app for a while. upgraded to Android 2.3.5 a few days ago from which time I have been unable to open handy safe.It does not recognize the password. I have emailed the developers twice for help but there has been no response. I am very surprised and disappointed at the lack of response. Without adequate backup any app is worse than useless.

Bradley - March 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.07
Great app! Defo worth buying
I've tried a few apps to keep my personal data safe and this one is the best i've come across.. Its simple to use and add info plus the encryption is the best out there info is safe from prying eyes with this....

Steven - June 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.07
Flanimal
Poo because the PC sync isn't compatible with my Samsung Galaxy Nexus. Crashes if left open. Doesn't save to dropbox. Fix these and Ill give it 5 stars.

Alex - March 8, 2012 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 1.07
OK, but..
Please get rid of the utterly unnecessary calls to media mounted, media ejecting, media removed and bad media removal.. It messes up Samsung devices that aren't rooted! You'll make a lot of people happier.

Bob - January 28, 2012 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 1.07
Great cross-platform app, BUT
If you install it on a Galaxy TAB 10.1 it will prevent you from connecting it to Kies (prevents the usb service app on theTAB to start). Force close or uninstall will fix it. Bob

Cintra - April 10, 2012 - Version 1.07
USB Syncing between my GS2 and iMac is a nightmare
I would give a 4 star but for the USB syncing. On my iPhone syncing HS Pro via OTA is simple. On the GS2 I struggle with USB. The instructions are wrong, and it is impossible to eject the SD cards safely when I finally manage to sync! Please introduce OTA syncing ASAP...

David - November 7, 2011 - Version 1.07
Really useful app
I've used this app for years on Symbian and am really glad it's now available for Android. Works the same and has a desktop app for easy data entry. Sync via USB is great. Would be nice if we could also sync via integrated DropBox support. Super useful and well implemented. Thanks Devs!

Avi - November 16, 2011 - Dell Streak with version 1.07
Desktop not backwards compatible with Windows Mobile
Will synch with newest desktop version only, but if you want to synch your passwords with a WM device as well, you can't.

Flaki - December 20, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 1.07
Pretty good
Pretty good app with excellent desktop sync software (unfortunately sold separately) with few imperfections

Evgu - February 3, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.07
good, except that
I had to reinstall to make it work on Gingerbread 2.3.3 - SGS

P V Gajera - December 22, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 1.07
Add suggestion
Please add option for online data synchronisation due to boring wire connection of Mass Storage.

Richard - January 13, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 1.07
Thanks for the move to SD - no more problems

Ilya - May 17, 2012 - Version 1.07
Greate app!

October 9, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.06
Johnr
Great app. Data secure and very well presented. Easy to find info. Syncs simply with paid for PC app. Could improve pasting images into notes. SGS2

Andrew - October 8, 2011 - HTC Flyer with version 1.06
Latest update now uses all of screen on HTC Flyer tablet which is much ...
Latest update now uses all of screen on HTC Flyer tablet which is much better. PC version used for synchronization has to be manually updated though.

Sandy - July 16, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.06
Must purchase after 14 day trial and even if you do you still can't ...
Must purchase after 14 day trial and even if you do you still can't get into your password safe. Developer does respond or refund your money.

Russ - October 9, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.06
Was 4 stars
Reduced to 1 for complete bloatware. 14MB just too much for HTC Desire. Uninstalling even though I paid good money fire this.

Abhishek - October 10, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.06
Great APP. With new update now supports high resolution screen also.

Alexander - October 9, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.06
WTF?
Now it's incompatible with HTC Desire...

Jon - October 9, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.06
Latest update bloated
Latest update takes 14mb. WTF?

Nikos - October 21, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.06
Incompatible to earlier versions. Just unacceptable!!!

Erick - May 22, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.05
Used it on my symbian mobile. Handy and user friendly app

motorro - April 30, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.05
Works and sync great. I vote for "disable card view" setting to. Manual lock ...
Works and sync great. I vote for "disable card view" setting to. Manual lock option will be great also.

YN - June 9, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.05
So a waist of money. I did not create a password. Yet it asks ...
So a waist of money. I did not create a password. Yet it asks me for password. Have sent developer email upon email upon email. No usefully response.

Brodovy - May 30, 2011 - HTC Desire S with version 1.05
Replaced with SPB Wallet.
1) Looks prettier than eWallet and allows to change cards on phone; 2) PC version supports export of base only from very old versions of eWallet and other applications; 3) PC version has lots of bugs; 4) Replaced with SPB Wallet which previously used with Win Mobile phone, and implemented much better than this application.

ifox - June 28, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.05
Works excellent with Galaxy S2. Was already using it on Symbian. Especially useful ...
Works excellent with Galaxy S2. Was already using it on Symbian. Especially useful when syncronizing with Desktop version.

September 12, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.05
Works OK (as free ones). Marked it down - doesn't say until too late ...
Works OK (as free ones). Marked it down - doesn't say until too late that it can't import data from the Symbian version

Ernesto B - May 31, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Tab with version 1.05
Excellent add on for my Galaxy Tab, syncs very well with my laptop

Ian - August 29, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.05
Good little app but could do with updating to fit the larger screens of ...
Good little app but could do with updating to fit the larger screens of the HTC Sensation and Samsung phones.

tony - June 11, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.05
Having read some of the comments I was a bit sceptical. This is excellent, ...
Having read some of the comments I was a bit sceptical. This is excellent, runs superb on HTC desire 2.29

Ralph - July 24, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.05
Not as refined as expected yet sufficient for keeping my personal info personal. ...
Not as refined as expected yet sufficient for keeping my personal info personal. Not overjoyed with UI. Card style a bit confusing.

Jenni - June 22, 2011 - Version 1.05
Fix Link2SD app compatibility. I paid $8 for this and it does not work. ...
Fix Link2SD app compatibility. I paid $8 for this and it does not work. Per link website I had to download this app in order to work and it doesn't.

András - June 7, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.05
Doesn't work in 9 out of 10 attempts! says: "Wrong password"

brife - July 3, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.05
When reactivating app after it loses focus it force closes.Aggravating having to ...
When reactivating app after it loses focus it force closes.Aggravating having to relogin.

David - June 19, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.05
Excellent app.!!!

JM - February 12, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.03
Used it on Nokia 9500, Nokia E90 and SE Xperia X1. Very nice. Now ...
Used it on Nokia 9500, Nokia E90 and SE Xperia X1. Very nice. Now on Android needs update, hope soon. Works but irregular. Desktop version works nice.

Chris - March 18, 2011 - Version 1.03
Essential app BUT Card view quite useless, option to use Info view at all ...
Essential app BUT Card view quite useless, option to use Info view at all times would be far better. Time for an update?

Ashdeen - March 13, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.03
Frequent crashes. Card view quite useless. Should be made App2SD. Worked much ...
Frequent crashes. Card view quite useless. Should be made App2SD. Worked much better on Symbian. Too expensive with the desktop app.

John - March 5, 2011 - Version 1.03
Great app well worth the cost

Bijan - March 19, 2011 - Version 1.03
Its really good app . But its too expensive ,

Steve - February 24, 2011 - Version 1.03
Had on my Nokia, missed it when moved to android, now I am happy ...
Had on my Nokia, missed it when moved to android, now I am happy again

January 25, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 1.03
It force closes all the time :(

Brad - December 2, 2010 - Version 1.03
Changelog?

Robert - January 21, 2011 - Version 1.03
this piece of crap erased all my data what it updated

David - February 5, 2011 - Version 1.03
Seems to be the working but force closes on a regular basis

Pete - June 20, 2011 - Version 1.02
Login screen
You really need to have a big onscreen button keypad .... it's practically useless trying to login using the fiddly built in keyboard when in a rush to grab you personal details.... uninstalled and lost my money :(

Geir - November 25, 2010 - SEMC Xperia X10 with version 1.02
Fantastic app, used on my Nokia for years. Synced my entire Nokia vault to ...
Fantastic app, used on my Nokia for years. Synced my entire Nokia vault to my X10, love it!

Rayne - September 21, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0
Good app but too many force closes!

Randall - July 8, 2010 - Version 1.0
Very nice program. A bit expensive compared to other similar apps. Lower the price ...
Very nice program. A bit expensive compared to other similar apps. Lower the price and add pattern lock for 5 stars.

brundda - August 1, 2010 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.0
Used it with symbian it was great then just a little bit more difficult ...
Used it with symbian it was great then just a little bit more difficult to sync but still indespencible

Olli - September 21, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0
Been using it since symbian, wish they would make a desktop mgr compatible with ...
Been using it since symbian, wish they would make a desktop mgr compatible with linux, then it would be perfect

Paul - August 17, 2010 - Version 1.0
"card view" is worse than useless as you need to key past it to ...
"card view" is worse than useless as you need to key past it to get to info; "notes" aren't correctly formatted

Synister - October 17, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0
Would five star if it weren't for the frequent crashes

Michael - October 2, 2010 - Version 1.0
Doesn't work as well as I hoped. On to the next one...

Mark - April 14, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR
Great app that fails
on my old Droid X and my new Droid Razr Maxx.... The app syncs well with my PC app an is overall very good but ALWAYS bombs on the phones.... It seems like the publisher is opponents oriented and Androids are a nuisance.

div.p: Хотя-бы тем, что можно делать импорт/экспорт через .csv файл. С этой версии увы. Синхронизация с компом не работает. Даже если бы работала - нет смысла ибо нет возможности импортировать .csv Разочарован...

div.div:
gdlkm - May 16, 2012 - Motorola Droid RAZR
Great. Works on Razor & SII
Love the CC icons which display like the actual cards.

santosh kumar - April 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2
Good one
